p: Investigation of the relative expression levels of prfA, flaA, motA and motB genes, after growth in the presence of C. sativa EO at 256 Î¼g/mL, by a real-time RT-PCR assay, demonstrated a 3.3, 8.1, and 16.8 reduction in the expression levels of prfA, motA and motB, respectively, ( p = 0.0541, p = 0.0819, and p = 0.0569, respectively). Interestingly, the relative expression of flaA also demonstrated a significant 241.5 reduction ( p = 0.0002) (Figure 3).
